entities.name: occlumency
entities.description: A magical technique used to prevent others from reading one's thoughts, mentioned in the conversation between Harry and Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Professor Severus Snape, a Hogwarts teacher, who is teaching Occlumency to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter, the main character, who is learning Occlumency from Snape.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore, the headmaster of Hogwarts, who is mentioned as someone who might be guessing.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The main antagonist, Voldemort, who is aware that Harry is gaining access to his thoughts and feelings.

relationships.description: Snape is teaching Occlumency to Harry.
The Dark Lord is aware that Harry is gaining access to his thoughts and feelings.
The Dark Lord can also access Harry's thoughts and feelings.
